Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Incredible machine -- but problems after a few months
Review Description: Updating this review (original below). Down ranking from 5 to 1 starsWhile this machine made a great cup of coffee it didn't hold up. After I was half way through the introductory coffees and two sleeves of Nicaragua coffee I got an orange light instead of the white light to brew. Read the instructions said it needed to be de-scaled/cleaned. Ran the cleaner through it following the instructions and water after.Made one cup of coffee (more than an hour after I wanted it). Not good to begin with. Week later went to make another cup off coffee, same problem. There is no way minerals built up after just one coffee. I think the system has a problem with its sensors. Another two weeks, same problem. I have neither the time nor the money to de-scale between every single cup of coffee. Definitely a problem. Really disappointing because the coffee was great. I have an older Nespresso machine I still use a few days a week just for a regular single shot espresso and it has never had a single problem EVER. This deserves 0 stars at this point.Original reviewFirst, I have an older Nespresso which I've enjoyed using for a couple of years. I'm delighted to now have this newer machine which makes both espresso and "American" coffee. s. In addition to being a two purpose (espresso and regular coffee) machine and saving counter space, it has significant improvements.First, the water tank is much larger than the espresso only machine. If filled to capacity it makes dozens of espresso or espresso + coffee for about a week (assuming 1-2 per day). Second, it is easier to remove, fill and replace the tank than older machines. The clear tank makes it easy to see how much water is left at glance before brewing. Nespresso sells capsules of different sizes. The sizes vary the amount of coffee and kind of coffee from espresso single shots, to double shots, to short coffee, tall coffee, and what I'd call extra tall which is to fill a to go coffee mug. Accordingly the cup stand can be set at a height for espresso cup lower for a "coffee" cup, lower still for a mug, or finally just removed to sit a to go mug on the counter. This flexibility is great and is enough for me to retire my Krups K-cup maker to the basement. The pod is easily removed and dumped into a tank which you can remove from the side to recycle the pods when full. The design holds about a weeks worth of pods and has a drip tray so the coffee in the pods can drip dry and not grow anything you wouldn't want in the kitchen.The machine does support Bluetooth, but on consulting with the company I heard that it only works with Nexus and iPhone. I have LG and Pixel phones and was unable to bluetooth pair the phone. As it turns out the only reason to pair it is to upgrade the software on the machine. The only reason to upgrade would be for problems with the machine, for which there are no known problems and there have been no upgrades. To me then this seems un-necessary and I don't see why they market it with Bluetooth with such limited support. But no harm caused.Now let's talk about the coffee. First, the coffees provided in the samples and which I've since purchased and incredibly high quality. Second, the machine does brew the perfect cup every time. The temperature is just right and every cup has a crisp crema which varies depending on the coffee. Mixing coffee with air adds incredibly to the taste experience and they've gotten it just right.I did actually break open one of the Vertuo capsules (Solelio). I then brewed the Solelio in an Aeropress. I was literally impressed. Certainly one of the top 3-5 coffee's I've ever tasted. Honestly, I liked the taste when brewed with the Aeropress better than brewing with the machine. But neither I nor more of us have the time to hand brew coffee every day, so I save that for slower weekends. But I do share the story with you because it is a testament to the coffee quality.Overall it is a great machine. The price for capsules is comparable to competitive products, but with a choice of types of coffee (espresso or regular) and quality I think this is a better machine than the k-cup machines.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: great machine broke 2x in 2 weeks, needs lots of care, nespresso, service difficult to reach
Review Description: At first, Machine seems so simple. But it requires a lot of care.  I learned from first Nespresso agent you are supposed to clean the machine , a 7 minute procedure, 2 x a week ( this is not in their literature) and with HOT water ( also not in the literature). Also, after making coffee you needed to open machine after 5 seconds and leave it open ( Not in the literature.)  Otherwise is clogs up with coffee grinds and the machine does not work.  Second Nespresso agent told us we only need to run the cleaning once a month.... not sure  which is right .We got this machine 6 weeks ago and initially loved it. However, it stopped working twice and nespresso customer service is near impossible to reach. Spent 30 minutes waiting on hold, 30 minutes talking to them two days ago. Machine appeared to work afterwards after they helped reprogram it. then next day there was a new issue with hardware: we had to force it open and closed. Another 1 hour spent on phone. This time we tried calling amazon, who after 20 minutes connected us to Nespresso ( and we were again on hold for them.)  Another long process usinga toothbrush, toothpick, paper towel and to clean machine  .  We are supposed to repeat this process once a month ( not in literature. )Yes, making coffee is simple but  the time you need to spend maintaining machine offsets it.  two separate people  at Nespresso were very helpful  and nice if you like talking to people for a LONG time.Bought this machine for simplicity making occasional single cups of coffee. Not so simple., We also own a 10 year old delonghi magnifica espresso machine that we've never had an issue with! And it makes better coffee. I guess we are going back to that!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Purchased this item and used for maybe 100 cups. Machine is VERY finnicky, sometimes it works, most of the time you have to turn it off, reset it, fiddle with it and eventually it will brew a cup. Nespresso support requires you to have an account with them to get help. They forced me to wake up my wife on her day off just so I could get support because her name was on the account. (apparently she registered the device at some point, or maybe Amazon auto-registers with the name the purchased on Amazon?) After setting up an account with their customer service which requires all your personal information they finally got to the "troubleshooting" part of the call. Prior to the call I had factory reset, descaled and cleaned the machine using online tutorials, non of this fixed the problem. The problem is simple. When a capsule is installed, the lid is close and the brew button is clicked. The machine starts, then stops, blinks orange twice and back to solid white...no coffee brews. Apparently this is the first time this has ever happened as I've been on the phone with Nespresso now for over an hour, the CS rep (while very kind) has gone to his internal team to try and figure out what could possibly be happening. Is there really a lot of mystery with heating up water, pumping it through a capsule and into a cup? How is it even remotely possible that there is some super strange out of the norm issue that could happen with this simple mechanical process. Mr. Coffee will brew you 10,000 cups before ever having a hiccup. We use the Nespresso machine because it's fun to have a variety of options and brew one cup at a time, but this machine has wasted so damn much time and cost me additional money buying descaling kits, etc. HARD PASS ON THIS ONE.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Stop Dreaming of Amazing Coffee and Buy It
Review Description: I’ve been making simple pour-over coffee for years after trying various other coffee brewing methods, and when I saw this on sale in an “Epic” deal for about $100 it was midnight and I was exhausted and clicked “buy” because I was dreaming of awaking to a steaming milky mug of damn good coffee on my bedside table. Alas, I awoke to no immediate-gratification-coffee but three mornings later I had my perfect cup in a few simple steps. I’m in love! So fast and so much better than any at-home (or even in-shop) brews I’ve had in ages. The milk frother on its own is a dream - previously used a $10 handheld device and the difference is astounding. I’m a heavy-on-the-milk kind of drinker and pouring a cloud into my coffee in the morning feels ridiculously luxurious. I would never have sprung for this at the regular $200+ price, and have already purchased off-brand tools to reuse the fancy-pants $1-2 capsules with my own coffee (thinning Lavazza), but had I known how awesome it is I would have!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I’ve had my eye on this machine for awhile and I finally took the leap thanks to my extended COVID work-from-home situation. Best decision. This is a great machine! I’ve tried others of the Vertuo line and this one has a lot of power for a small(er) machine. It works well for me in a kitchen with limited counter space. I like the options of using it for full cups of coffee or espresso. All of the flavors and pod options so far have been amazing and SOOOOO much better than a Keurig. Only thing I would note is the Bluetooth pairing. While it’s not necessary to pair it, the printed instructions that came with the machine aren’t helpful with pairing. The Nespresso app had different pairing instructions than the printed ones that worked a lot better. I’d follow the app instead of the booklet. Overall a must-have machine for anyone that wants a stylish, small-space friendly machine that makes delicious, easy to make coffee or espresso!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Bought this for my husband last Christmas. He loved it at first, the coffee tasted great, better than his favorite coffee shop. However, it started acting up, so I descaled it with the descaling solution sold by Nespresso. It worked a few times after that, but now it doesn’t work at all. Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I rarely write reviews especially poor reviews, but I must warn others - Do NOT waste your money or time on this nespresso. I purchased this machine on prime day and it arrived damaged. It was functional but the side piece was popped out and wouldn't go back in. A $200 coffee machine should be perfect. Amazon didn't hesitate to replace the item and I was thankful. Replacement machine arrived and worked fine for about two weeks. It should be known we were only using it on weekends so it had probably only been used about 7 times before it malfunctioned. Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: 2 machines in 2 months- nothing but problems
Review Description: We got our first machine and it was great. We loved the coffee and espresso it brewed and loved the selection of pods and drinks we could create. After about 3 weeks of everyday use we noticed one day that our drink has significantly less liquid than it usually does. We checked around the machine and it was sitting in a puddle of water. We thought maybe it was an error on our part, so we did some trouble shooting. We cleaned the inside of the machine. We made sure the water tank was secure and we could see a bubble rise when attached. We called contacted customer service and they had a tach run through more troubleshooting with us. To no avail, the machine kept leaking from the side. It was not leaking coffee, just water. Upon further research, this is as VERY common issue it seemsWe sent it back and received a replacement. Worked wonderfully for about another 3 weeks. We were paranoid and made sure to make sure the water tank was secure. Made sure we were cleaning it often. And again, around the 3/4 week mark the machine is not working again.This time it was not a leak. It simply was not brewing. Sometimes random sputter of like a teaspoon of espresso came out, but other than those random sputters. No brewing at all.Went through all the troubleshooting again. The machine did not even respond to us trying to flush the water tank.We ended up returning the machine for a refund. Looking into reviews here, the nespresso site, and reddit, it seems that this model is nothing but problems.I am torn between even trying another vertuo line model- maybe the plus or just getting an original line model.Anyways- save yourself the time and headache- DO NOT GET THE VERTUO NEXT

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Just received my coffee machine in the mail. I purchased it as an early Christmas present to myself and was eager to open it and try it out (no way I could wait until Christmas!) The box the machine came in was a little…rough..looking. I was afraid maybe I’d gotten a used item? The outside shipping box was in great condition. It seemed okay though once I took it out, so I plugged it in and did the self clean, like it instructs you to do before your first use. It was LOUD. Very loud. I figured maybe that’s just the self-clean working over time to really give the machine a good power wash. Sadly, that was not the case. Opening the machine is hard. It’s not a simple twist, you have to really put your weight into it to lock and unlock it which is really annoying but maybe it will loosen the more you use it, hopefully? I put  the pod in and turned it on. It was even louder than the self-clean. It sounds like an airplane engine! If you want a quiet machine, Keurig is the way to go. Or maybe you’d have better luck with one of their other machines. The coffee does taste really good and I like that it gets foamy. However it doesn’t get very hot. Maybe I just got a faulty item. I’d try one of their other machines or possibly a Keurig. I’ll try it again tomorrow. Pretty bummed. Wasn’t sure if I should give it a 2 or 3 star since the machine is pretty and the coffee does taste nice.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: This machine is flawed and needs work. Watch Youtube reviews and read them on Amazon. The top is very hard to close, it doesn't heat the coffee well and the crema produced is poor quality compared to the other 2 models in the Vertuo line. We ordered a Plus after returning this one and it's like night and day different. We also opted for Breville over DeLonghi, I think there's a difference.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: Should have paid attention to the other reviews with issues similar to mine. I purchased this on 12/27 and it stopped working by 1/18. Simply won’t start no matter what. I didn’t experience leaking to the extent other reviewers did, but when I moved the machine to trouble shoot, there was a light film of water on the counter around the machine that I hadn’t previously noticed. Before it stopped completely, it also began acting erratically - would brew different size cups from the same pods.  Seems like the barcode concept not very well designed. Also the majority of the coffees that came with machine were very bitter, did not enjoy at all. I did enjoy the Single Origin series Costa Rica and Columbia pods. I wanted to be able to create my Starbucks drinks at home so spent another $50 on Starbucks pods, now stuck with pods I can’t use. I also own a Nescafe Dulce Gusto Genio 2 machine that I bought in Nov 2020 that continues to work great, allows you to customize your drinks by setting the brew bars different than recommended and looks cool as hell on my countertop plus takes up why less space.  Plus the Starbucks pods taste exactly like Starbucks whereas something just wasn’t right with the Nespresso pods. If your lazy like me and just want to push a button, highly recommend the Nescafe machine.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Received Oct 29th and now it’s not working
Review Description: Super bummed. Love the color and seemed easy to use. It seemed to work fine the first week and then realized it was leaking water out of the sides? Then I started to notice there was more water coming from outside the machine than in my coffee cup. And now it’s not working.  Upon receiving, I followed all the directions before plugging and starting this machine up. After dealing with the headache of not getting it to work,  I looked on YouTube and I guess it’s a common thing with this nespresso machine. I will be returning and will look into another nespresso machine. I’ll give them another shot Because it does produce good espresso’s and coffee.  Bummer.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Super bummed!! No wait, extremely bummed. I purchased my Nepresso on Black Friday. Shipping was quick and arrived with a wide array of coffee. After my first couple of cups, my machine quit brewing hot coffee and top it off... my frother has quit.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Too much troubleshooting for what’s it’s worth.
Review Description: This has been the most touchy product I’ve ever purchased. It requires troubleshooting of some sort every 2 weeks.  Today the whole thing just stopped working.  Says it’s ready to go....nothing. We’ve gone through the entire manual as well as tips from users on you tube.  We’ve wasted so many capsules in the process of trying to fix it.  I went to send a message to nespresso via the Amazon address listed and the support site is telling me my email address isn’t right (what?  Says who???). So no support option available for me!  I love the coffee this thing makes when it’s working, but at this point this finicky product is not worth the money.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I have one of the original Nespresso Machines and I love it. I make my cappuccinos and my wife makes her flat whites when we want to kick back and relax. We both love the flavors of the coffee and how easy it is to use, so I decided to purchase this one for our regular morning coffee. It seemed simple enough since it just had one button and you could connect to your phone. Well the joke is on me. After a couple of months of use it started to give us error codes with a flashing light. The phone app is absolutely useless. The only thing that does is tell you either the machine is ok or that it needs attention. Other than that it only guides you tutorial videos on how to operate it. You have to look up in your manual to figure out what the flashing lights mean and to accomplish a descale or anything else is ridicules! Now it only works on the rare occasion no matter what I do. I'M DONE!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I am a Nespresso fan, this was my 2nd machine, but I’ve had trouble from the start on this one. The coffee isn’t very hot, and the machine malfunctioned repeatedly. Plus this model is pretty loud. I’m accustomed to their machine nuances with cleaning and descaling but this one required constant factory resets, and spending 20 min in the morning troubleshooting the coffee maker repeatedly does not make for a great start to the day. It then began leaking concentrated coffee on my counters from underneath the machine (couldn’t tell at first), staining my granite countertops. Maybe mine was just a lemon, but if you see this trend continue, beware.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Try as I may, I couldn’t leave less than one star.  This machine is total trash
Review Description: I ordered this as a gift off a registry, and within days of using it, it started leaking.  Reached out to Customer Support, and they wanted to send a replacement part.  Replacement parts on a brand new machine after only a few days?  Um, no.  So I got a replacement of the machine.  The replacement came, and that one just totally stopped working within two weeks.  Called Nespresso again, and they conceded that this particular machine is prone to issues, and they said to send it back and they will send out a different model.  Well, that model arrived today, and it leaked immediately - that’s when we noticed that a piece had clearly been glued back on. So, they pretty much sent us a refurbished, broken model.  Now they say they’ll send out another, but with a “welcome” pack, whatever that means.  All I know is that I’m months into this, still don’t have a functioning machine, and am out upwards of $200.00.  If it wasn’t a gift, I would have walked away after the 2nd dead machine.  Let’s see what machine #4 brings.  I’m going to stick with my Keurig, and not some overpriced, glorified piece of garbage.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: The flavor of the coffee is ten times better than any Keurig coffee. Very rich and flavorful. The crema is very good.I would agree that I would prefer the final brew to be hotter. I can't speak to every Nespresso product, but I would attempt a coffee brew machine from a more reliable company.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I ordered this after staying at a hotel with a Nespresso machine (it wasn't a next). Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Important..Read this before you buy ZERO STARS IF POSSIBLE
Review Description: Here is the short answer to your question.  No.. You should not buy this machine.  The machine has a Flaw in the design.  There is a drain hole on the top which passes through the same cavity as the bar code sensor.  The geniuses who designed this beast choose to put a friction connection between the plastic molded drain and the hose.  This connection is not a barbed hose, it is a rectangle boot.  Why would you use a square connection to attach to a round hole?  no idea.. But you will!  The connection leaks on to the Barcode sensor lens  (and then out the bottom of your machine) poof!  dirty and uncleanable problem  (unless you take apart the machine like I did - I am on my third machine replaced under warranty and I am not buying another one or one every year to drink this great over priced coffee. )  This machine will eventually give you the error of two yellow/orange blinking light followed by a white - No coffee for you!!!!!.  Its reads in the troubleshooting manual as "needed cleaning" but if you use the APP it will tell you its an UNREDABLE BAR CODE ERROR.Another problem I found is the plastic cup the bar-code sensor sits behind both scuffs/whitens due to the spinning action and cracks internally making is suspect its ability to allow the sensor to read the bar code.Its amazing how mush these machines leak.,  I have included a few pictures of the inside of the machine as well and the cracked cup and the connection that leaks.This system make a great cup of coffee but the machine is doomed to frail. What makes this worse is the company MUST know this problem exists yet still sells the machine.  You have been warned

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother

I would definitely not recommend this product and am so disappointed we purchased this.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I used to go to Starbucks every single day, but now that I have the Nespresso machine I prefer the lattes I make over going out. It has saved me so much money. Even better it is sold by the company so it is a genuine machine. I purchased pods from the Nespresso company directly since it you get a welcome kit if you order through the company to get the espresso and coffee.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I have had a Nespresso Citizen that is still working after 10 years, but I prefer coffee to espresso so I decided to purchase the Nespresso Vertuo. From the beginning I noticed the Vertuo wasn't easy to get working, not because its complicated you literally push a button, but because the machine seemed to not register the press of its button to start brewing and it took a lot of reopening, closing, pushing the button repeatedly to get it to work. Unfortunately after 6 months the machine does not work at all and I can't simply ask for a new machine via Amazon. Amazon guided me to Nespresso website to go figure it out with them. Not a great experience or machine. The coffee is nice and an easy clean-up so that I do like.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I have fair and accurate details about my experience, but my review is being rejected by Amazon.  So, I'll be brief and to the point.  Coffee taste is very good and has many options.  The machine does not make a hot cup, just warm.  The machine had frequent brewing issues and they happened off and on for a year.  The machine finally stopped working completely 2 weeks past the apparent 1 year warranty.  The Nespresso all over the internet stated 2 year warranty, but it was just a year.  Nespresso USA has refused to fix or replace my machine. I have wasted many pods with brewing failures and now have pods with no means to brew.  I will find another brand that is less frustrating to own.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I purchased the Vertuo Next Nespresso machine October and frankly I'm highly disappointed. We've had a Keurig for years that hasn't had as many problems as this Vertuo Next machine has had in just a few months.Problem #1 - Only one button/light.How is the user supposed to know when the machine is clogged/needs cleaning or attention? You lock the machine and press the button and wait for it to dispense and nothing comes out. This is supposed to be the indicator that it needs attention? Well now I'm out (an expensive) single use pod.The Keurig has 3 lights that clearly indicates if you need to wash or descale. For a premium product that the Vertuo is trying to be (with the price tag) you would think it would have better troubleshooting than its cheaper counterpart the Keurig.Problem #2 - BluetoothWhy even add bluetooth connectivity if all it is going to offer is a way to buy nespresso pods from your app? It could integrate so much better. It could notify the user if the machine is due for cleaning!!!!! Or sync with google assistant or amazon alexa for voice commands to start a morning coffee but no; just a useless add-on to raise the price point even higher.Problem #3 - User manual is garbage. I've tried all of the recommended troubleshooting tips and my Vertuo machine still wont dispense coffee. and when it does it oozes out the front making a mess instead of flowing out the nozzle like intended.Problem #4 -Even if this product had more indicators to the user about failures and better tips/troubleshooting--the fact that it needs this much maintenance to work is a huge con.  I've only had this machine since October and it is already failing on a regular basis.Keurigs and coffeemakers that are years old still work for me just fine and at a fraction of the price.It is a shame because the coffee, when it works, tastes great.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Unreliable machine with poor customer support
Review Description: The machine was great for the first 8 months. Then it went into descaling mode every 2-3 days. Review Title: They last 13 months. I’ve had 2. Coffee is expensive
Review Description: It’s a good $100 a month for 2 people to have coffee once a day. The machines are close to $200 and last 1 month longer than the warranty. Figure it out, buy a de’longi for $300 and coffee from the grocery store. The 2nd month your actually saving money! I got stuck this time. Just bought $160 worth of pods. Next one is the last one. Very disappointed!!!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: Buy into the hype. Buy all the flavor pods. Join the club with enticing discounts before paying for overpriced marginal coffee. Then when stuck with a Shiznizle load of pods the machine takes a dump! Now forced to buy another technological inferior machine or eat the sub par coffee pods. Better to order straight from Greenwell farms in Kona Hawaii for 100% Kona coffee and spend $10 on a cheap machine.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: This machine worked well for a couple of months; then it failed at pumping water through—several attempts to contact Nespresso's customer service and not a single reply. My wife enjoys the flavors, but the machine's reliability has left a bad taste for us.Update June 29, 2021I still stand by their poor customer service through online means of communication. However, calling their service line was a polar opposite story. I was taken care of properly, and after some troubleshooting, it was determined a replacement was in order. I received my new machine and have yet to have issues.I have updated my review to reflect four stars.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: DON’T BUY! They break after a couple months!
Review Description: We bought ours in may of 2021. The first one broke after a month or two. The second one worked until November and we are being sent out 3rd one in less than a year! We LOVE the coffee and the size and flavor options so it’s really disappointing. We asked if we could try a different model since this one seems to have a lot of issues and they said no, that the warranty only replaces for the exact item. It’s really frustrating having to keep calling customer service before you’ve even had your coffee in the morning. I believe it’s just the next that has issues. Everyone I know with the original or deluxe does not have any issues.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: This unit is supposed to be programmable to set your desired amount of coffee per pod, problem is most people just want to press the button and have coffee so they press multiple times when it doesn't work and it goes into shut down mode.  Either that, or I just got a really bad one.  Either way it's of no use unless it's a single user who can figure out it's idiosyncrasies.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Reviewer Name: Things that make you go hmmm
Review Description: Below is my review of the first machine I received. The replacement machine started malfunctioning even sooner than the first machine. If you search online for help re leaking malfunctioning vertuo next you will see tons of people having problems with this machine. Don’t buy it!!!![prior review] When my first Vertuo Next was delivered it looked like it had been repackaged. No surprise that it broke within three weeks. Leaked water; would not auto stop the brew process.  Amazon promptly sent me another machine which looked like it was new. However one side of the machine is not fully assembled - the side wall is not properly connected to the body of the machine. The machine works at least. ?!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: No!I am not a connoisseur of coffee, but this literally makes the worst coffee I’ve ever tasted.I threw 8 out of 10 cups away before I sent this machine back.  I never even used the frother.After the machine was finished, it has a strange foam on top. The whole thing was just gross.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: We got the Vertuo Next for Christmas. This is our first machine. Visually, the top part sits proud of the bottom when closed. This shadow line bugs me, I feel like the top and bottom halves should line up perfectly. Do you think this is an issue? Otherwise, the machine seems to be working fine. TIA.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Bad machine and bad customer service
Review Description: We've been part of the Nespresso Club since 2013.  It used to be a product we loved, and we have recommended it to many of our friends over the years.  That changed with the Vertuo Next machine.  After numerous calls and online chats with customer service, we got the run around with a faulty machine.  Instead of offering to fix the unit, we were repeatedly asked to run the clean cycle on the unit.  The Nespresso website clearly says "We offer a 2-year warranty on all machines and Aeroccino."  But, customer service says 1-year for the Vertuo Next.  Nespresso lost a long-time customer and many referrals on this one.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Although the machine started out fine, it all came crashing to a halt a week after Christmas when it stopped brewing coffee.  We tried video fixes, troubleshooting via the app and called the hotline on New Year's Day to walk through possible issues.  The agent said return it.  It would not brew, run the cleaning, do factory reset, or connect to the app. I see many others with the same issue for the Vertuo Next, so I suggest looking elsewhere for your pod coffee maker.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: I could not be more disappointed in the Nespresso  Vertuo Next machine. Biggest disappointment is the coffee is not hot! Upper side of warm at best! After the first descale process, the machine programming was not right. Touch of the button “ON” no worky. Wasted two to three pods for every one cup of coffee due to machine did not function properly after descale.Call me stupid, but I did purchase another model because I do enjoy a great cup of coffee and Nespresso does have a great cup of coffee.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: If you use a Kireg don’t switch. This is a cumbersome and poorly designed product. The space for the used coffee pods is a waste of space, also ends up with liquid and cause mold and smell. Access tot he water reservoir is poorly drained and if the machine is under a cabinet getting the reservoir of an back on is cumbersome.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Perfectly worked after few uses.  I noticed little water leaking from topper and my laziness just ignored.  After 2 months, it horribly ruined wooden coffee bar as above picture. I tried to fix but still leaking when machine brewing the coffee.  I just put replacement through Amazon (thanks for return period!).Otherwise, I've been enjoying coffee. Taste like heaven, great coffee selection in Nespresso homepage, and most importantly, I don't go Starbucks anymore. Can not wait the replacement.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: Wish it made the coffee hotter.  Did not expect it to be quite so noisy.  I’ll take all that as finally found a product akin to European flavors and smoothness.  I’m really enjoying my coffee now.  Love that there are 4 different size ounces to select from and multiple strengths and flavors.  Also that pods are recyclable .

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Absolute garbage.  Only works half the time.  Wasted $10-15 worth of coffee in under a week.  Goes off into never never land where it just does nothing but sit there and laugh at you. The original Vertuo  (which I have) works great.  Sending it back tomorrow!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift, and he loves it!We spend an embarrassing amount of money at big box coffee shops every month, and this has cut down our spending drastically.We purchased a milk frother, and are sipping our lattes for a fraction of the price.Update 2/23/22 Our machine started leaking unexpectedly. A phone call to customer service and they are sending us a new machine. Best customer service ever!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: The first Nepresso had been used and was broken. The serial number on machine did not match the number on the box. I sent it back and received a replacement. It was broken and also had opened capsules inside. It also was used and dirty. Waiting on refund. Very dissatisfied. I have never had anything like this happen through Amazon.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Great product if you can afford it, returned after two days
Review Description: this is an absolutely great product if you have the money or the time. not too many options for refillable reusable pods unless you want to take the time to reseal the pods but you still have to spend money on the foil lids and the way to seal them.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: It’s been a week and so far I love the taste of the coffee and espressos. I like how quickly it makes the coffee, too, it doesn’t require time to warm up the water. The one thing I’ve hated though is the opening and closing (unlocking and locking) function. It requires way too much force that if I’d had arthritis or carpel tunnel, I’m sure I’d be unable to use this machine.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: The machine makes excellent coffee.  It failed after less than one week and perhaps 15 cups of coffee. A replacement has arrived and I’ll let people know how that machine does.  Not impressed so far at all.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: We have had this machine for less then two months and have three clips of a few days where it stops working. We use it at least one or two times a day and then it will stop working, the company said the first time it was because you needed to have it cleaned each month- even though we had only owned it a few weeks. They said they would send out a descaling kit which they didn’t until a second chat on their website. Now the machine won’t descale and won’t brew any coffee. Numerous pods have been ruined trying to get one cup of coffee to brew.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Great while it works. Stops working after few months.
Review Description: I use this machine quite often (around 4 times a day) and they always break after few months. The first one I got broke after 10 months (would refuse to brew coffee with orange light blinking). I got a replacement unit from Nespresso, and same happened, this time after 6 months. I do clean the machine, apply the cleaning solution once in a while but this model seems destined to failure all the time. If you drink coffee that often, don’t buy it.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I purchased this as a birthday gift for my husband. The box came torn down the seam and the unit was dusty and stained inside. It's used or "refurbished" but I ordered and paid full price for a new machine. It also doesn't work. I am returning this product and giving up on ordering from Amazon. I'm very disappointed with this purchase.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Great cup of coffee but first machine crapped out after a month.  Returned it no problem.  Second machine has the same issue.  Sensor problems, descaling or whatever.  This machine is a good concept just bad implementation.  Maybe a more expensive version would actually last, for $160 this is what you get.After a month, they decide to retire.  Save your money.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: It was great while it lasted. The machine broke after one month. Nespresso said they would replace it but they are totally out of stock so they made me get a completely different machine, the VertuoPlus, which now reading the reviews for that machine it sounds like it will break in a month as well.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Custom pods that are hard to find
Review Description: This machine uses special pods with a barcode so you can only buy them from Nespresso. What a waste of money! I’m returning it and getting one that uses generic pods.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: This machine is the worst. Stopped working after one month. Just more than 30 days. Amazon said can’t return. Nespresso says return through Amazon. Absolutely awful. Do not buy. Save your money. Otherwise you’ll be out $200+ AND have no coffee.Updated review: May 12.Second machine received. Brewed one coffee. Is not working again. The button on the top isn’t responding, which is the same issue as the first unit.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: Makes great coffee. Pods are expensive but worth it as the resulting coffee is much better than brand K. Has nice foam head. Lots of variety in pod choice.  A few issues: small mug platform that’s not big enough for large mugs. Small water reservoir that doesn’t give any warning when it’s low. I got unit for a good price and would buy again despite these issues because the coffee makes up for shortcomings.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: The espresso machine did exactly like it promised and gave me a wonderful experience of the espresso club which I am now a proud member. I would wholeheartedly give a recommendation for this product. It makes a good jumpstart to my day!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Don’t do it don’t do it don’t do it!
Review Description: When the product works it’s FANTASTIC. The coffee tastes good and it’s rather convenient. However, I have had 2 of these machines now and both of them have broken. The first one I was able to return to Amazon because it was within my return window but the second one I am unable to get my money back for and am severely disappointed. For such a price tag, Nespresso really needs to make something that lasts more than 2 months. I haven’t even been able to go through all of my coffee pods before it broke!! It’s only worth it if you’re willing to gamble that it might break on you one morning. I’ve been chatting with Nespresso customer service and it has been zero help.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: The next model is riddled with issues. Leaking, overheating, needs constant cleaning. I wanted to like this machine but it only worked for about 3 months, then the problems started... you'd be better off with one of the Breville models. The older Breville model is very reliable. The coffee is fabulous when the machine makes it!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: This is an excellent set. It's like having my own Cafe at home. The parts are easy to clean and the app is nifty for setting the machine and ordering pods. I also appreciate that the company recycles them. This isn't a quiet machine, but I don't mind.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Nespresso is wonderful, delicious, creamy coffee and this machine worked well for maybe a week or two. Then it wouldn't stop blinking to clean and descale it so I let it clean itself 10+ times trying to figure out why the light wouldn't turn off. I went through tons of forums, instructions, etc trying to find a solution but it refused to work correctly so I had to send it back and purchase a bigger, better version.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine + Capsule Set; Color: White
Review Description: I had a few products from this brand. Initially I loved my Nespresso breville, but the coffee started tasting a little off. Now I switched the machine to this one. Not sure I like it. Makes ok-ish coffee, but the taste is still a little iff. Tried multiple pods but I couldn’t get rid of this off taste, more like a metallic bitter taste.  Otherwise no mechanical problems, no leaks, looks nice and slim

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Works well but not compatible with any reusable pods. A big thing to keep in mind. Nespresso pods are like $1.50 each which is a lot for at home coffee. Ended up returning because I was not interested in purchasing all of those single use pods. Felt very wasteful. The machine itself is just fine.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Title: Leaks after less than a year of use
Review Description: It leaks. It’s under warranty, but Nespresso will not send me a refurbished machine until I send this one back. So, I guess I’ll be without a machine for a couple of weeks. Also, I never received the shipping label they promised to send via email, and it was very difficult to communicate with the overseas customer service representative.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: This coffee maker makes an excellent paper weight/ counter space waster. The first one I got leaked like a sieve and the exchange one Amazon sent went lights out after 2 weeks. This product is a joke. The only productive thing it did for me was reaffirm my faith in Amazon’s return policy. Save yourself the expectation and just go ask a wall to brew you espresso... you’ll get the same results.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Wow this thing is better than I hoped! It is a really awesome coffee maker. It’s a coffee frothed really…we use it on special occasions. The cups are very expensive.  Also, the spent casings are collected in a hidden hatch on the left…it removes completely for cleaning. Be careful to have a towel underneath as some coffee pools in the casing hatch.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Put of the box the side of it was popped out. Tried to pop it back in place and it just will not click. Seems like a manufacturer error maybe. Ordered a replacement. Will update review when received

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: with every cup this machine leaks coffee into the recycle bin.  online research shows that not every machine is affected the company know about it.  i am going back to either the Nespresso Vertuo or the Vertuo Plus ive had good experience with both

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: This is the second one I have purchased that stopped working???
Review Description: I love this machine when it works.  It should be simple, but its seems there are mechanical issues.  It has just decided not to brew coffee anymore.  or will take 15 minute to start brewing? I have reset it and nothing?  There is also no return or refund policy.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I’m on me second replacement within two months and need another. My first one leaked. Now this one doesn’t brew the regular coffee pods correctly. I’ve wasted so many pods “testing” and so upset that this doesn’t work

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: Works about 25% of the time. Has been a huge waste of money especially considering it will waste the pods and not have any espresso dispense.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: SO POORLY PACKAGED! The actual machine was dirty and looked used. Even the coffee pods were dented and damaged. So disappointing because this will be the 2nd machine we have returned. The first one stopped working after 2 days. Will not purchase again... :(

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Bought as a gift for grandson and his wife they were very excited to receive it loved it and then 2 weeks later it stopped working, not sure why, but want you to know the company was very good to work with and shipped out another one very fast.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Promised coffee pods were not included as shown
Review Description: The coffee maker was fine, but the listing showed it as coming with a boxed set of 12 coffee pods. Instead, there were 6 loose pods tossed in the box. So, not only were 6 missing, I don’t know who handled these….. it’s the principle, and about $13 worth of coffee.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Title: Stopped working in a few months
Review Description: I changed my review on this product because at first it was great. However it started having problems after about six months and now has completely conked out.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Do not buy it not reliable
Review Description: Not a big reviewer so take note. This machine may make a great cup of coffee ,but it fails so often it’s just not worth it. Do not buy this machine. Nothing but problems almost every weekend I use it. It’s like new so the reason for the issues are anyone’s guess. Stay away . I have reset to factory settings, unplug  reset turned upside down. Orange flashing light now it’s does nothing. Can’t take it anymore way to sensitive machine sorry just not worth the risk.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Horrible system. Not pumping water after 6 months
Review Description: This is the worst Nespresso machine I ever got. After 6 months it stopped pumping water and I need to get a technician to fix it.Difficult to get in touch with support.The machine makes a great coffee, but the system is not really intuitive and you need to be careful when closing the top. My machine also spills coffee inside and I didnt know, until I opened the machine and saw coffee spilling everywhere. Is not related to the caps container, its just faulty.If I could return the machine and buy another model I would do so. Don't recommend this machine.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Sad machine. Not a pleasant experience.
Review Description: I’ve had this machine for a year. It was a Christmas present from last year. Tried it a few times, very disappointing. Drank the free coffees and decided to research how to use because the instructions were totally lacking. Thank God for YouTube. So I was rolling along, it worked everyday like a champ for about two months. Leaks like a sieve. I have factory reset it so many times. Tried to contact the company. No help. My opinion is toss it in the trash, support seriously lacking, if you want espresso, buy an espresso maker.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Problems after first month, completely broke after third month
Review Description: I started experiencing problems with this machine after the first month of use. I reset it a few times and it would temporarily work again. Then, it unexpectedly stopped working after the third month. Very disappointed in the poor quality of this machine.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: The machine stopped working after about 2 weeks and making only a few coffees. Now it just does NOTHING when I press the button. I tried all the reset procedures but they don't work either. The machine is supposed to reset when you press the button quickly 5 times. Reset should be indicated by flashing orange light. This does not happen with my machine! I'm also unable to pair the machine with the phone app.I'm totally disappointed. I want to return the machine and get my money back!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: The entire box inside was destroyed. And my coffee maker is filthy. For as much money I spent on this I expected MUCH better. No instructions or anything!!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Error out of the box. Tech support wasn’t able to fix and manufacturer wasn't available.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: never worked and came dirty scratched and used with grounds in it. We have ordered two of these and even sent a new one by nespresso. It just quits and staying on the white light and won’t do anything no matter what “reset” or cleaning you do. Waste of money.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: We LOVED this machine in the beginning. Fabulous tasting coffee. Then the descaled light came on and we have tried everything for over a year to try to make the machine work again. It simply will NOT go out of descaler mode. Many people on line have had the same problem. I have written to their customer service people and they have not replied at all. I am really upset that I have received NO RESPONSE from Nespresso!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: At least once a week it malfunctions, due to air in the water line or overheating. YouTube offers some simple fixes but if you have somewhere to get to, ie in the morning when you want espresso before work, you’re screwed.Update: first one lasted 5 months, Nespresso replaced it and it lasted 4 months. They sent a refurbished one this week since I am in the last half of the one year warranty. Out of the box, it didn’t work. Maybe the fourth time is the charm.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: My Vertuo Next was an absolute dud! Unfortunately I started using it after the return window closed and it was a total dud. Didn’t last 30 days! Won’t go in to descale mode. What a bust!!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: I am enjoying this machine immensely. Delicious cups of espresso and coffee. Get the milk frother also.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: This is my second Nespresso Next Machine. I got my first one from target, and ended up returning it after a few days because there was an issue with water pooling in the capsule portion of the machine.I bought this second machine in hopes it would work out. Honestly, while the coffee is pretty good. The design is not so great. The crema on my coffee also only lasts a minute... then is totally gone.I do not want to deal with returning this again, but I really wish I did not splurge for the budget friendly model, because I am getting product which lacks quality.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: After about a month it started having problems.  I would have to run a cleaning cycle before every brew.  in the second month it refused to brew at all.  I followed all the troubleshooting tips, contacted customer  support, nothing worked.  ended up throwing it in the trash after only 2 months and buying a Breville nespresso brewer.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: OK, if you need espressos or other coffees other than standard drip I can see why this machine appeals to you. However the coffee it makes is really no better than what I make on my Keurig with the fresh coffee adapter.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Amazing machine! Super easy to use, super easy instructions to follow, and INCREDIBLE coffee! I tried getting a Starbucks a few weeks back and it didn’t hold a candle to how good my Nespresso coffee is. I did have a slight issue with my machine about 1 month in. It had a leak under the water tank. I called Nespresso customer service and they walked me through a hard factory reset. The leak went away for a few hours then came back (it flooded my counter!) I called back and they sent me a brand new machine plus complementary coffee of my choice. Excellent customer service! I highly recommend Nespresso products! I love my Vertuo Next.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Bad design. Machine breaks after a couple of months.
Review Description: Worst Nespresso I have owned, and I have had a few. The machine mysteriously stopped working after a few months, just long enough for the return period to be over. Tried everything with this machine and it looks like I’ll have to buy a different one. Also, the machine has a Bluetooth app, BUT the app doesn’t allow you to start the machine and brew a cup?! Why Nespresso?!!!! You had one job.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Why did we wait so long?
Review Description: We LOVE this machine! It has absolutely replaced our daily Starbucks and Dutch Bros habits! The pods do need to be special ordered and aren't readily available at the store, but we have gotten in a groove now and know when we need to order ahead of time to ensure we never run out. The machine is compact, quiet, and super easy to use.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: This was obviously already opened. The machine was weirdly covered in dust and not in the packaging correctly. The box was retaped and instead of the welcome box of coffee pods it had a few banged up ones thrown inside the box.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Was great for a month till it wasn’t
Review Description: This Nespresso machine was great for a month until it stopped working. We descaled it it worked for about a week and then it wanted to be descaled  again. Now it’s simply won’t work at all and I have $100 and Nespresso pods just sitting there. Waste of money

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Initially received this December 29th and the water receptacle was broken.  Instead of sending me a new one, I was told I had to return the entire machine.  Received new one and now it simply won’t brew.  Press the button and nothing happens.  Doesn’t start blinking, then eventually turns itself off (which it never did before). Save yourself the aggravation

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Great coffee when it isn't refusing to brew and flashing orange lights
Review Description: Brewing back to back pods is basically impossible. This is our second machine, first one completely stopped working. It requires to to be wash cycled after 1 use. Used the descaler within 300 uses as directed and it didn't help. Sounds like this is a lot of peoples issues. Surprised it has so many stars when you actually read the comments its clear it should not be highly rated.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Defective unit. Spent an hour on the phone with Nespresso to confirm it. Contacted Amazon and they’re replacing it.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Machine is great and well worth the splurge! Very low maintenance. You aren’t constantly filling the machine with water or emptying the pods since the canister is so late. The machine is a little loud, too poke a hole in the pod and the spinning of the machine.  The milk frother is a life changer since it does hot and cold. It is also pretty much silent. Very easy to clean.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I purchased this coffee maker after reading the reviews where people were raving about it . I had high hopes but they were squashed real quick . First off it’s easy to use no doubt but boy does it make a lot of noise for a coffee maker . The coffee comes out warm instead of hot . I wanted to really give it a try but use after use it’s just been disappointing. I’ll just stick with the keurig .

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Don't buy this machine, mine stopped working properly within 2 months
Review Description: I liked the compact size and the price point, and the coffee was terrific, but it stopped working within 2 months.  The brew button stopped working and I ended up wasting multiple pods to get one cup.  Little spurts of coffee come out instead of the proper ounces and it is luke warm.  I purchased the machine in mid September!  Descaling didn't help.  Don't buy this machine.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Love my new addiction to my coffee bar !

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: noisy big machine, irregular flow that falls on the machine, just a lot more water than the classic capsule (same taste as pushing twice on a regular)

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I found it difficult to find the right selection of coffee..  I have purchased several sleeves only to be stuck with something that I don't like.  The coffee does come out frothy and delicious; just wish I could put in my own brand of coffee.  I found the selections to be limited or mixed with coffee sizes I don't need.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I purchased 3 Vertuo machines for Christmas gifts . It is still January 2of 3 have stopped brewing blinking lights won’t descale or reset. Have sent all 3 back . Kurig is 💯 more dependable and the pods are much more affordable and accessible.Nespresso coffee is delicious and strong. But what’s the point if you can’t have it when you want it . Very disappointed won’t buy another nespresso brand item again.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Don't waste your money. It began leaking out the sides, then 2 weeks later it stopped working all together. And good luck trying to deal with Nespresso...

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: The coffee is not strong as an espresso should be, and the flavor is similar to any common coffee. Temperature is average, not common for espresso. If you really LOVE coffee, buy the original Nespresso.Cleaning process takes too long.Design is good, and the possibility of having bigger cups is an advantage comparing to the original one.Not having to choose the quantity is cool.I still prefer the original Nespresso since I am used to the Brazilian coffee.If you are used to the Americans, it is a good option.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: This product splattered coffee all over the countertop while brewing. I’m returning it.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: The machine works fine but it’s so big, clumsy, noisy and hard to operate than previous designs. I really regret getting this this one and wish I could send it back. I highly recommend getting something else.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Machine broken after making 3 cups of coffee.
Review Description: Successfully made 3 cups of coffee over the first 2 days of use. On the third day the machine is displaying a constant flashing light that was not possible to reset, even after a call to Nespresso support. Support agent suggesting sending it back for replacement, suspected faulty heating unit or sensor. I will return it but will not take a replacement. This machine (Vertuo Next) seems to have some serious reliability issues also judging from other users commenting on Amazon as well as on the Nespresso site. I used two other Nespresso machines (OriginalLine) that have worked flawlessly for years.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: So easy to use to get my double espresso in the morning.  I love it.  It’s compact too, and that’s exactly what I wanted.  The only drawback I can find, is I have to order the pods online.  I can’t find them in any store that I’ve checked so far.  But other than that, it’s a beautiful thing!  ❤️

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Two weeks and it leaks and now stopped brewing
Review Description: The coffee was really good, at first it brewed quickly and was good quality. About a week later it started leaking and now the button doesn’t work to turn it on, nor does the button work to brew coffee(I’ve been having to open and close it to turn it on). Nespresso is sending a replacement out, I’ll update this after a few weeks of having that one.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Sent an issue through Amazon that the product I purchase isn't working two weeks ago and have yet to get a response. I bought the Vertuo Next on September 9th and as of October 1st, the machine isn't working and Nespresso has yet to respond to this issue. The machine is under warranty, so my ask is to replace or refund my money ASAP. Not responding to this issue is not ok.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: If you’ve been wanting one - GET IT
Review Description: I used one while on a trip and had to have it! Such an easy machine to use & it delivers! It reads the pod you use so you’ll never mix up espresso with coffee which is great. It’s super easy to clean and takes up very very little space.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: After reading reviews regarding this product. I'm glad I did not listen to negative reviews. (sucks that it happened) my Nespresso machine came in perfect condition, no issues with leaking, perfect heat espresso, works FANTASTIC. you know, sometimes you have to take a leap of faith and just go with your gut. you can't expect perfection each time. Def worth the price point. good luck! you won't be disappointed.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: It spills out the side from the used pod collector. Not happy with this machine.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: I don't know how this has such good reviews
Review Description: This is my second machine of the same model. It worked fine for the first 3 months or so and then it just gives up on you. I push the button to make a cup of coffee and nothing happens. I have to unplug the machine, wait 10 seconds, plug it back in and only RARELY does that work. I ordered the Nespresso Vertuo Plus and am hoping it works better than this one.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: My first new Vertuo Next machine leaked a considerable amount of coffee into the capsule dispenser after using it 10 times.  The second replacement machine leaked water around the head on the right and front onto my countertop the first time I used it.  This machine will be returned as well.  Thank goodness for the ease of Amazon returns.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: Bought this as a present for my girlfriend and it stopped working after the first cup. Second time she went to use it kept giving an error and it wasted multiple pods. Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I've returned two machines in three weeks. Does make great coffee, but not recommending a purchase.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Howdy, bought one of these for my girlfriend. Worked great for a couple months then just stopped working completely. Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: This machine is great however it has proven to be far less reliable than other coffee makers. After multiple customer support calls and two replacement units we are unable to reliably produce the right amount of coffee per pod. Along with wasting perfectly good pods, our machine has started spitting up coffee grounds and is leaking after brewing a cup. The coffee is great but the headaches are not worth it.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Excelente producto tanto en calidad como estéticamente, estamos muy satisfechos 100% recomendado!!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: My friend recommended me to buy it. After receiving it, I learned the operation process and made a perfect coffee. I like it so much.The price also makes me very happy, the Amazon offers are great!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Broke after 1 month plus 10 days - After Amazon return window
Review Description: This stopped working after exactly 40 days. All of the troubleshooting made no difference. It will not brew. Amazon only allows returns for 30 days so I'm 10 days past the window. The only fix is a repair or replacement provided under warranty. If you want to spend your entire Sunday morning online with Amazon support and then encore with Nespresso support going through a slew of rituals that make no difference then you will get your money's worth - if that's not your preference save yourself the headache.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: I purchased this machine in August and within 2 weeks began to have issues.  Have tried reaching out for support and zero response, this is brutal.  I am an avid Nespresso user, both me and my family use the machine daily and our last unit last 5+ years, this one weeks.  I am at a loss, worse experience ever.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: I was disappointed in the box it was shipped in very beat up. The nespresso machine itself was very dusty was.nit wrapped in plastic no user manual and in the description it shows 12 pods and I had 3 just tossed in the box makes me wonder if this is even a new machine or a used one when I thought I was purchasing a new one. Very disappointed but it worked when I tried it

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
