Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: Got this for my grandson who is in college.  It was a replacement for one just like it that stopped working just after one year old.  The new one would did not work when it was received by him.  He called and the machine was replaced with a more expensive machine that is working just fine.  Would not recommend this coffee pot.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Title: Item was sent to me USED
Review Description: This item was sent to me and the box had obviously been tampered with. When I opened the box it was obvious that this item had been used. There was dirt over everything, there were nespresso pods (which did not come with the product) that had been scattered and they had dirt on them. The machine itself looked like it had been thrown carelessly in the box. Very obvious that it was used prior. The machine works however I’m super disappointed that this was a USED machine sent to me.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine Only; Color: Dark Gray
Review Description: While we loved the flavor and convenience of the coffee, we had to send back the  first machine after ~3mos, and then a month ago the second machine stopped working.  Nespresso's response was that we could get 35% off of a new machine as we were still under warranty.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Delicious Coffee - But… the Machine Doesn’t work
Review Description: The coffee produced by this machine was delicious.  However, the machine stopped working after making just a few cups of coffee. Amazon replaced the machine, but unfortunately, the replacement also broke within a week.  Both machines leaked water horribly and neither one was response to the single button design.  The machine was unreliable from the start.  This thing needs to be re-engineered.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: If at first you dont succeed, order a replacement.
Review Description: The first unit I received was an epic failure, work right about 3 times... then coffee was cold, no froth.  One foggy morning, I woke up and the only thing the machine produced was blinking torange light of misery.I opted to order a replacement, and so happy I did.  The new one so far works like a dream and the coffee is hot and frothy, just like all the hype.Hopefully it continues to last!!

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: Love the Nespresso maker I got. It makes great coffee in under 1 minute and I love the foamy top that it produces. Highly recommend anything by Nespresso and be sure to try their double espresso pods.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Title: Locking and unlocking way to hard to do.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Review Description: It will make amazing coffee for like a month then something will go wrong and you will have to call customer support or replace it (This is my second one)Save your money and buy the older version for less hassle

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
Variant Details: Style: Machine + Capsule Set; Color: White
Review Description: I LOVE my Nespresso. Took forever for it to arrive but very nice none the less. The coffee pods have a stronger taste than Keurig; however, it does not stay hot. I have to microwave my cup of coffee to get it as hot as I like but the flavor is amazing.

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother

Review Description: AN EXCELLENT MACHINE - OUTSTANDING COFFEE IN 30 SECONDS - 1 MINUTE; MINIMUM CLEAN-UP.BUT - I THINK THE RECYCLE OF THE COFFEE PODS IS OVERDONE. Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother

Product Title: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, White with Aeroccino Milk Frother
